<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/77026</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77026</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b808782d-61e4-4ece-9dd6-d6d0b050d57a#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Egyszikű növény levelei</string>
            <string language="en">Leaves of monocotyledon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verläßt vom monocotyledon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Part du monocotyledon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sae do monocotyledon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">_ andare monocotyledon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλα του monocotyledon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se va de monocotyledon</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Egyszikű növény mellékerezetes, szárölelő leveleiről készült felvétel</string>
            <string language="en">Snapshot taken on monocotyledon's lateral-venose, stem-clasping leaves</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Egyszikű,  mellékerezetes,  levél,  szárölelő,  </string>
            <string language="en">monocotyledonous, lateral-venous, leaf, stem-clasping</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Snapshot, der auf den monocotyledons 
seitlichsind genommen wird, Stamm-umklammernd verläßt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'instantané pris sur les monocotyledon 
transversaux-venose, tige-étreignant part</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O instantâneo feito exame nos monocotyledon 
laterais-venose, haste-stem-clasping sae</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La fotografia istantanea presa sui monocotyledon 
laterali-venose, gambo-stem-clasping va</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στιγμιότυπο που λαμβάνεται στα πλευρικός-βενοσε, 
μίσχος- clasping φύλλα των monocotyledon</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La foto adquirida los monocotyledon 
laterales-venose, va'stago-abrochando se va</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">monocotyledonous, seitlich-venös, Blatt, 
Stamm-umklammernd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">monocotyledonous, transversal-veineux, feuille, 
tige-étreignant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">monocotyledonous, lateral-lateral-venous, folha, 
haste-stem-clasping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">monocotyledonous, laterale-venoso, foglio, 
gambo-stem-clasping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">monocotyledonous, πλευρικός-φλεβικός, φύλλο, μίσχος-</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">monocotyledonous, lateral-venoso, hoja, 
va'stago-abrochando</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77026</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
